channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Log4j
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Log4j

item.title: CVE-2017-5645|2024-08-05T15:11:47.391Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20log4j
item.description: In Apache Log4j 2.x before 2.8.2, when using the TCP socket server or UDP socket server to receive serialized log events from another application, a specially crafted binary payload can be sent that, when deserialized, can execute arbitrary code.
